snippet: Jean Dujardin does his best De Niro impression, in front of Robert De Niro, at the New York Film Critics Circle dinner.
abstract: Jean Dujardin does his best De Niro impression, in front of Robert De Niro, at the New York Film Critics Circle dinner.
lead_paragraph: Moments before Robert De Niro sat next to him, Jean Dujardin was trying out his De Niro impression. Mr. Dujardin, the handsome, elastic-faced French star of "The Artist," was at the New York Film Critics Circle awards dinner on Monday night, where "The Artist" won best director and best film. The event capped off a whirlwind day that included a lunch with the publicist Peggy Siegal and the taping of an appearance on "Charlie Rose."

headline.main: Doing His Best De Niro Impression, in Front of the Real De Niro
